prompt: An awe-inspiring galactic location deep within a nebula, the Nebula Citadel. The citadel is a colossal, ancient starship converted into a fortress, surrounded by swirling, colorful cosmic dust and bright stars. The architecture features a mix of artful, ancient design and futuristic elements, with glowing runes and massive celestial gates. The scene is illuminated by the ethereal light of the nebula, giving it a surreal and majestic aura. This is a full art image with no text.
